name: Medium density fiberboard (MDF), at MDF mill
description:
All weights given on an ovendry basis.

Important note: although most of the data in the US LCI database has 
undergone some sort of review, the database as a whole has not yet 
undergone a formal validation process.
Please email comments to lci@nrel.gov. Review off this data by three industry representatives selected by the composite panel association (CPA); two  academic reviewers selected by editors peer review journal

category.name: 3212: Veneer, Plywood, and Engineered Wood Product Manufacturing

processDocumentation.technologyDescription: The MDF process represents average US technology.
processDocumentation.samplingDescription: Survey of industry production practice; manufacturing technology typical for industry
processDocumentation.restrictionsDescription: All information can be accessed by everybody.
processDocumentation.intendedApplication: Only mass allocation factors are available for the multi-functional processes (disregard economic allocation factor values-they are mass allocation factors).

exchanges.description: 1.0 m3 of mdf weighing 741 kg which includes wood, resin, wax, etc;  ovendry weight; wt. average for 4 mills in US

flow.name: Medium density fiberboard (MDF), at MDF mill
